title: Can Miami Make the 2020 NBA Finals Even More Interesting? | The Mismatch
description:
Verno and KOC talk about Miami’s win in Game 3 of the NBA Finals (3:07), what to look for in Game 4 (18:54), and whether they think that Miami has a shot to make this series even more interesting (31:47).

Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor
